data.name: Chemistry World
data.detailed_description:
Chemistry World

Chemistry World is a game where education and fun are paramount. The game aims to provide a fun and educational learning environment that can be used for school, for building knowledge or just for fun.

The game is built with school computer hardware in mind so that this game is accessible to anyone with a laptop or PC.

Furthermore, we have built the game as an open-world in which different storylines can be followed. We have done this so that players are not tied to levels but also have the freedom to explore the world.

It will also soon be possible to play multiplayer, so you can get smarter together with your friends! We will also make available dedicated servers of the game where various events will be performed.

What can you expect?
- Single player and multi player
- Open world
- Low poly style
- Suitable for many hardware
- Education and fun
- Forums, Documentation and Stats

data.short_description: Chemistry World is a game where education and fun are paramount, this game is made with low-end hardware in mind. It is an open-world game with different storylines that contain different chemistry topics.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I7-2700
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel integrated graphics
  • Storage: 4096 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
